TopicTitle: Internet puking at site of KSP new server

Articles.Content: For the past 5 days my internet has been puking at the server, could never load anything on kerbalspaceprogram.com forums, store, could t get to the main page either, it finally works today, i wonder why.
I think it\'s because the new server is 20% cooler.

I think it\'s because the new server is 20% cooler.

Saw my new avatar eh?

Its so cool that I\'m designing a cannon specifically to fire fridges at it.

The Irony Gun - AMLPR\'s newest defence.
